text:
The IIS7 - Tomcat6 Connector howto should give a hint, that in 64bit environment the used IIS Application Pool should have "Enable 32-bit Applications" set to "False". Otherwise the isapi redirect will not be called and returns an http code 404.
If you think, the 32bit version of isapi_redirect.dll would do the job instead, you will get an http code 500, because the library is not loadable.
creator: Christoph.Pollmann@web.de

text:
Thanks for the information.

Fixed in r1187956.

Regards,

Rainer
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
